sandypython.safe_dill¶

sandypython.safe_dill.save(*args, **kwargs)¶

Save the contents of the sandbox’s globals, to be restored by load().

sandypython.safe_dill.load(*args, **kwargs)¶

Load the contents of the sandbox’s globals which has been saved by save().

sandypython.safe_dill.set_safe_modules(safe_mods)¶

Set a list of safe modules that pickle’s load global opcode can import.

sandypython.safe_dill.loads(str)¶

unpickle an object from a string

sandypython.safe_dill.dumps(obj, protocol=None, byref=False)¶

pickle an object to a string

sandypython.safe_dill.debug(boolean)¶

print a trace through the stack when pickling; useful for debugging

sandypython.safe_dill.register(t)¶
sandypython.safe_dill.copy(obj, *args, **kwds)¶

use pickling to ‘copy’ an object

exception sandypython.safe_dill.PicklingError¶
exception sandypython.safe_dill.UnpicklingError¶
